description:
Kenshiro is perplexed by Han`s dying words, that he can never become a savior. But the Land of Asura remains unaware of the fact that the news of Raoh`s coming is wrong, and chaos persists. In the midst of this, a villager named Kosem who eagerly awaits Raoh`s coming decides to start an all-out revolt. But the Asuras realize that Raoh will not come, and the villagers are massacred at their hands. Arriving during this, Kenshiro hears someone demanding to know why he is here and not Raoh...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Cruel Prophecy! Kenshiro, You Cannot Be the Savior!
Terrible nouvelle ! Kenshiro, tu ne peux pas être le sauveur !
非情の予言! ケンシロウお前は救世主になれない!!
